Message: My lord didn’t just save me,

And yet, I still haven’t been able
to do anything for him in return.

And on top of all that,
I’m a witch.

I know that with
the way I am now,
I’ll never get anywhere.

I will become someone
who has the confidence
to stand by his side.

I’d never be able to
tell this to his face...
This time, I’ll change for sure.
